name: @lokascript/mcp-server
description: Model Context Protocol server for HyperFixi hyperscript development

scripts.service:setup: echo 'Copy com.hyperfixi.mcp-server.plist.example to com.hyperfixi.mcp-server.plist and update paths, then run service:install'
scripts.service:install: test -f com.hyperfixi.mcp-server.plist && cp com.hyperfixi.mcp-server.plist ~/Library/LaunchAgents/ && launchctl load ~/Library/LaunchAgents/com.hyperfixi.mcp-server.plist || echo 'ERROR: First copy .plist.example to .plist and configure paths'
scripts.service:restart: launchctl stop com.hyperfixi.mcp-server && launchctl start com.hyperfixi.mcp-server
scripts.service:status: launchctl list | grep hyperfixi || echo 'Not running'

author: HyperFixi Team
